short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 3dcart is a complete shopping cart solution. Use this extension to import products from Aliexpress directly into your 3dcart Store.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use this extension to import products from Aliexpress directly into your 3dcart Store. Along with that, you will be able to build an order on Aliexpress once your clients purchase a product from your 3dcart Store.  With the click of a button, the extension will place the items on Aliexpress' cart and bring the customer information for you. All you have to do is process the payment and have Aliexpress send the item on your behalf.
